Project_Title: Small RNA sequencing of small extracellular vesicles derived from senescent vs. nonsenescent human dermal fibroblasts (HDFs) (human)
Project_Description:
We report small RNA sequencing technology for high-throughput profiling of microRNA content within small extracellular vesicles isolated from nonsenescent and senescent human dermal fibroblasts.
Overall design: Comparison of microRNA profiles of small extracellular vesicles isolated from senescent vs. nonsenescent human dermal fibroblasts
